message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a smaller share, let's get closer to the goal!
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I'm not giving up too much yet!
I'm willing to take a risk, but you need to give me a bigger share now!
I'm not giving up too much, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm not budging, take the small share or we'll go to the limit!
I'm not going to give up my advantage now. I'll take a bigger share, but I'll still give you a decent amount.
You're getting desperate, take the crumbs or we'll go to the wire!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take a huge share, and you'll get a small consolation prize.
I'm not going to let you take everything, you'll get a tiny bit!
I'm not going to let you get away with this! I'll take almost everything, and you'll get a tiny bit.
You win, I lose, but I'll get nothing, so you get nothing too!
